00053             function                __construct()
00054             {
00055                   try
00056                   {
00057                         $this->BlockSettings = get_package_object( 'settings::settings' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00058                         $this->Database = get_package_object( 'database' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00059                         $this->String = get_package( 'string' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00060                   }

00093             function                process_query_field( $ProcessingString , $Changed )
00094             {
00095                   try
00096                   {
00097                         for( ; ( $MacroParameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $ProcessingString , 'query_field' , 
00098                                           array( 'field' => TERMINAL_VALUE , 'query' => TERMINAL_VALUE ) ) ) !== false ; )
00099                         {
00100                               $this->BlockSettings->load_settings( $MacroParameters );
00101                               $Result = $this->Database->query( $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'query' ) );
00102                               $Result = $this->Database->fetch_results( $Result );
00103                               if( isset( $Result[ 0 ] ) )
00104                               {
00105                                     $Result = $Result[ 0 ];
00106                               }
00107                               else
00108                               {
00109                                     throw( new Exception( "No data found for the query \"$Query\"" ) );
00110                               }
00111                               
00112                               $Value = get_field( $Result , $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'field' ) );
00113                               $ProcessingString = str_replace( "{query_field:$MacroParameters}" , $Value , $ProcessingString );
00114                               $Changed = true;
00115                         }
00116                         
00117                         return( array( $ProcessingString , $Changed ) );
00118                   }
00119                   catch( Exception $e )
00120                   {
00121                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00122                   }
00123             }
00124             
00147             function                get_record_field( &$BlockSettings )
00148             {
00149                   try
00150                   {
00151                         $Value = '';
00152                         $id = $BlockSettings->get_setting( 'id' );
00153                         if( $id != '0' )
00154                         {
00155                               $PackageName = $BlockSettings->get_setting( 'access_package_name' );
00156                               $PackageVersion = $BlockSettings->get_setting( 'access_package_version' , 'last' );
00157                               $PackageObject = get_package( $PackageName , $PackageVersion , __FILE__ );
00158                         
00159                               $Record = call_user_func( array( $PackageObject , 'get_by_id' ) , $id );
00160                               
00161                               $Field = $BlockSettings->get_setting( 'field' );
00162                               $Value = get_field( $Record , $Field );
00163                         }
00164                         
00165                         return( $Value );
00166                   }
00167                   catch( Exception $e )
00168                   {
00169                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00170                   }
00171             }
00172             
00199             function                process_record_field( $ProcessingString , $Changed )
00200             {
00201                   try
00202                   {
00203                         for( ; ( $MacroParameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $ProcessingString , 'record_field' , 
00204                                           array( 'access_package_name' => TERMINAL_VALUE , 'field' => TERMINAL_VALUE , 
00205                                           'access_package_version' => TERMINAL_VALUE , 'id' => TERMINAL_VALUE ) ) ) !== false ; )
00206                         {
00207                               $this->BlockSettings->load_settings( $MacroParameters );
00208                               
00209                               $Value = $this->get_record_field( $this->BlockSettings );
00210                               
00211                               $ProcessingString = str_replace( "{record_field:$MacroParameters}" , $Value , $ProcessingString );
00212                               $Changed = true;
00213                         }
00214                         
00215                         return( array( $ProcessingString , $Changed ) );
00216                   }
00217                   catch( Exception $e )
00218                   {
00219                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00220                   }
00221             }

00253             function                process_string( $Options , $ProcessingString , &$Changed )
00254             {
00255                   try
00256                   {
00257                         list( $ProcessingString , $Changed ) = $this->process_record_field( $ProcessingString , $Changed );
00258                         
00259                         list( $ProcessingString , $Changed ) = $this->process_query_field( $ProcessingString , $Changed );
00260                         
00261                         return( $ProcessingString );
00262                   }
00263                   catch( Exception $e )
